desc: East Coast Hockey Life is a clothing & equipment brand created in Prince Edward Island, Canada. Our premium products are built to last, and designed to represent the East Coast properly. We carry hats, touques hoodies, tshirts, socks, underwear, and accessories.

layout.text:
Hockey is in the DNA of the East Coast. We play hard, and we're proud of where we're from.
Our premium products are built to last, and designed to represent the East Coast properly.
